biotools.summary: Software for the deconvolution and analysis of high-throughput, pooled, genetic screens. It is designed for screens which use next-generation sequencing as readout. It provides modules for identifying screen hits via rigorous statistics, visualizing screen readout and performing downstream functional and network analysis.

bioschemas.name: HiTSelect
